monotonicity.name: monotonicity
monotonicity.description: 单调性不变量，如双指针或二分的单调推进

optimal_substructure.name: optimal_substructure
optimal_substructure.description: 最优子结构不变量，如动态规划的最优解可组合

state_transition.name: state_transition
state_transition.description: 状态转移不变量，如状态机/博弈 DP

interval_additivity.name: interval_additivity
interval_additivity.description: 区间可加性不变量，如前缀和

interval_mergeable.name: interval_mergeable
interval_mergeable.description: 区间可合并性不变量，如线段树

divide_conquer.name: divide_conquer
divide_conquer.description: 分治不变量，如子问题可合成

topological_order.name: topological_order
topological_order.description: 拓扑序不变量，如 DAG 依赖顺序

convexity.name: convexity
convexity.description: 凸性不变量，如斜率优化或凸包

idempotency.name: idempotency
idempotency.description: 幂等性不变量，如 RMQ/倍增

cycle_invariant.name: cycle_invariant
cycle_invariant.description: 环不变量，如置换环或判圈

capacity_constraint.name: capacity_constraint
capacity_constraint.description: 节点容量约束不变量，如网络流中节点的流量上限

modular_invariant.name: modular_invariant
modular_invariant.description: 模运算下的不变量性质，如同余关系在操作中保持
